line.originaltext: 2 cups boneless chicken breast halves, cooked and diced
1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Slice the top off of each bun, saving the tops.
line.annotation: cut(ing53, , ing60, "sliced buns", "slice the top off of each bun, saving the tops")

line.originaltext: Slice the top off of each bun, saving the tops.
Hollow out each bun, leaving a shell.
line.annotation: do(ing62, , ing63, "hollowed buns", "hollow out each bun, leaving a shell")

line.originaltext: In a medium bowl combine chicken, cream cheese, Pepper Jack cheese, Parmesan cheese, garlic and spinach.
In a medium bowl combine chicken, cream cheese, Pepper Jack cheese, Parmesan cheese, garlic and spinach.
line.annotation: combine({ing54, ing55, ing56, ing57, ing58, ing59}, ing64, "chicken mix", "")

line.originaltext: In a medium bowl combine chicken, cream cheese, Pepper Jack cheese, Parmesan cheese, garlic and spinach.
Spoon mixture into each bun, packing it tightly; cap with bun tops.
line.annotation: combine({ing61, ing63, ing65}, ing66, "filled buns", "spoon mixture into each bun, packing it tightly; cap with bun tops")

line.originaltext: Wrap each bun tightly in foil.
Wrap each bun tightly in foil.
line.annotation: do(ing66, t7, ing67, "foiled buns", "wrap each bun tightly in foil")

line.originaltext: Bake in preheated oven for 20 minutes.
